content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5) to (0.5, 6.5)
This structure generates electricity using steam power.
Consists of the following entities:
*   Offshore Pump at position (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) extracting water.
*   Boiler at position (x=-5.0, y=2.5) heating water into steam (fueled with coal).
*   Steam Engine at position (x=0.5, y=6.5) consuming steam to generate power.
*   PipeGroup connecting the Offshore Pump to the Boiler (positions include x=-8.5 y=-0.5, x=-7.5 y=-0.5, x=-6.5 y=0.5
